mapper.insert:
select seq_pdnumber.nextval from dual
insert into property_detail(pdnumber, pdcontent, pdmoveindate, pdbath, pdlift, pdbed, pdlot, pdheating, pdcooling, pdmicrowave, pdburner, pdfridge, pdshoecloset, pdtv, pdcloset, pddinningtable, pdtable, pdwasher, pdinduction, pd_pnumber)
values(#{pdnumber}, #{pdcontent}, sysdate, #{pdbath}, #{pdlift}, #{pdbed}, #{pdlot}, #{pdheating}, #{pdcooling}, #{pdmicrowave}, #{pdburner}, #{pdfridge}, #{pdshoecloset}, #{pdtv}, #{pdcloset}, #{pddinningtable}, #{pdtable}, #{pdwasher}, #{pdinduction}, #{pdPnumber})
